aors.model.agtsim.agentControl
Class AgentControlBroker

java.lang.Object
  aors.model.agtsim.agentControl.AgentControlBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentControlListener
public class AgentControlBroker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AgentControlListener

A broker to notify AgentControlListeners about new initialized core agent controllers. The broker is implemented as a singleton. That ensures that all AgentControlListeners and CoreAgentControllers use the same broker.
